reasoning: VKC is a chronic allergic inflammation affecting primarily children/adolescents in warm climates. Estimated prevalence ~0.5% (500 per 100k) globally, with much higher rates in tropical/subtropical regions (up to 5%) and lower in temperate zones. Geographic variation is high.
source: Leonardi A et al. (2017). Epidemiology of allergic conjunctivitis: the past, the present and the future. Curr Opin Allergy Clin Immunol. 17(6):451-457
